title: STUN
summary: STUN (Session Traversal Utilities for NAT) is an auxiliary protocol for transmitting data around a NAT (Network Address Translator). STUN returns the IP address, port, and connectivity status of a networked computer behind a NAT.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
